snippet.title: MOVING UP IN THE WORLD! - Passpartout - Artist Simulator! (Passpartout Gameplay / Passepartout Game)
snippet.description:
Today we are here to take a look at a very fun upcoming Simulator-ish game called Passpartout. In this you run an art shop where you sell your own creations to whomever is willing, trying to make enough to pay your rent, and buy your wine! I hope you all enjoy this gameplay of Passpartout!

Draw and sell your art to pay for your wine and baguette addiction. In this stereothypcially French setting you embark on a quest to become a renowned artist. Draw masterpieces and listen to the customers critique to progress in the art scene. The only thing that's in your way are the bills. Survive the economic hardships and become a great arist!

Game:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/582550/Passpartout_The_Starving_Artist/

Join The Ninja Discord!
https://discord.gg/rD276jm

Links:

See My Face!?!: https://www.youtube.com/cirby88solo

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ashofmars
